00017 // Table
00018 class Table : public data::Table {
00019 public:
00020     using base_type = data::Table;
00021     using key_type = decltype(base_type().table_id());
00022 
00023 public:
00024     bool Serialize(void *buf, size_t buflen, size_t &uselen) const;
00025     bool UnSerialize(void *buf, size_t buflen, size_t &uselen);
00026     void AfterUnSerialize() { }
00027     size_t GetSize() const { return base_type::ByteSize(); }
00028     key_type GetKey() const { return base_type::table_id(); }
00029     std::string ToString() const;
00030 
00031 public:
00032     void OnTableRoutineCheck();
00033 };
00034 
00036 // TableManager
00037 class TableManager : public BasicManager<Table>, public lsf::basic::Singleton<TableManager> {
00038 public:
00039     using base_type = BasicManager<Table>;
00040     using room_index_type = std::map<std::pair<conf::ENTableType,uint64_t>,std::set<uint32_t>>;
00041     static const size_t DEF_CHECK_INTERVAL = 10*1000;
00042 
00043 public:
00044     bool Init(key_t shm_key, uint32_t max_size);
00045     Table* GetTable(uint32_t table_id);
00046 
00047 protected:
00048     Table* CreateTable(conf::Table const& table_conf);
00049     void ReleaseTable(uint32_t table_id);
00050 
00051     std::set<uint32_t>& GetRoomIndex(conf::ENTableType type ,uint64_t sb) {
00052         return _room_index[std::make_pair(type, sb)];
00053     }
00054 
00055     std::set<uint32_t>& GetRoomIndex(Table const& table) {
00056         return GetRoomIndex(table.table_conf().table_type(), table.table_conf().small_blind());
00057     }
00058 
00059 private:
00060     room_index_type _room_index;
00061 };
